Title: Authorizes the town board of the town of Lewisboro, county of Westchester to establish certain speed limits on rural major and minor collector roads at twenty-five miles per hour
Summary: Authorizes the town board of the town of Lewisboro, county of Westchester to establish certain speed limits on rural major and minor collector roads at twenty-five miles per hour.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the town board of the town of Lewisboro, county of Westchester to establish certain speed limits
